question: Which country houses the historic cricket ground "Broadhalfpenny Down"?
explanation: England houses the historic cricket ground "Broadhalfpenny Down". Broadhalfpenny Down is a historic cricket ground in Hambledon, Hampshire. It is known as the "Cradle of Cricket" because it was the home venue in the 18th century of the Hambledon Club, but cricket predated the club and ground by at least two centuries.
